SENT.plain: Calcium antagonists are currently under investigation as potential beneficial drugs in the prevention of cerebral vasospasm
However, some calcium antagonists have the propensity to inhibit platelet aggregation
This study investigated the danger posed by the administration of calcium antagonists for recurrent hemorrhage in a simulated rat model of subarachnoid hemorrhage
We found that verapamil, a calcium antagonist with antiplatelet activity, lowers clot resistance and may promote rebleeding
